title: Owner initialization
description: Determine the initialization process of the smart contract owner.
whitepaper: The owner of the smart contract is initialized by setting the deployer of the contract as the initial owner during the execution of the contract's constructor. This is achieved by assigning the deployer's address to the private `_owner` variable and emitting an `OwnershipTransferred` event with the deployer's address.
code: The owner of the smart contract is initialized to the account that deploys the contract, as indicated by the line `address msgSender = _msgSender(); _owner = msgSender;` in the constructor of the `Ownable` contract. This is done when the contract is first deployed to the blockchain.
